summary: Inventory dashboard application with a Reports menu, including an Inventory Report (stock change history), currently affected by an authentication/connection error that needs fixing.
architectural_notes: Inventory Report is located under Reports menu and displays stock change history.
Inventory Report page should not require authentication (app runs without login).
Harden frontend↔backend connection/retry handling to avoid 'Unable to connect to the service' on page load.
known_issues: Opening Reports → Inventory Report triggers an authentication error and fails to load.

existing_features.title: Ensure the frontend Inventory Report view loads reliably and does not display any authentication-required error state when opened from Reports → Inventory Report.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add/ensure Reports → Inventory Report submenu that shows stock change history (histori perubahan stok).
Improve connection mechanism to backend/service so the app reliably loads the Inventory Report page.
Remove/avoid authentication requirement for opening the Inventory Report page (fix erroneous auth prompt/error).
Update the backend inventory report query so that opening the Inventory Report page does not require authentication (anonymous users must be able to call `getInventoryReports`).
